name: slendytubbies time to change
description:
a horror game 

made by ydderf

some sprites aren't mine, this is explained in the credits in the game 

all songs aren't mine.

the game is in spanish, sorry, english is not available for now.

motion controls

arrow keys to move 

shift to run

M to see the map

P to pause

Z to select

X to exit

and mouse control for other functions
